description: The Whakata Puffy is inspired by your favorite winter insulator. It features PrimaLoft® Bio™ insulation to keep your feet cozy, and a Bloom algae-blended resin footbed and midsole to keep them comfy while being good for the planet. This pull-on moc also has a crushable heel for casual cruising or quick exits.
name: Oboz Whakata Puffy - Mens
